name: Monokuma
otherNightReminder: Monokuma points to a player, if no one was executed today Monokuma points to 2 players. :reminder: or :reminder: :reminder:
ability: Puhuhu! Each night*, choose a player: they die. If no one was executed today, choose a second player: they die.

name: Junko Enoshima
firstNightReminder: Junko points to a player. Show 2 character tokens, 1 of which is correct.
otherNightReminder: Junko points to a player. Show 2 character tokens, 1 of which is correct. Junko points to a player. :reminder:
ability: Bluffs are sooooo boring... Each night*, choose a player: they die. Each night, choose a player: you learn 2 characters, 1 of which is correct.

name: Mukuro Ikusaba
ability: H-Huh? This wasn't...supposed to... Each night*, choose a player: they die. Night 1, choose a player: if you die by execution they become evil and Junko Enoshima.

name: Celtestia Ludenberg
otherNightReminder: Night 2: Celeste points to a player. :reminder:
ability: Do as I say, swine! On night 2, choose a player (not yourself): they become evil.

name: Sayaka Maizono
otherNightReminder: If Sayaka successfully nominated a good player today: Sayaka points to a player. :reminder:
ability: You'll do anything to help me get out of here, right? Once per day, if you nominate a good player and they are executed, that night choose a player: they die.

name: Genocide Jack
ability: Murderous fiend!  Once per game, publicly announce your role and choose a player: they die.

name: Leon Kuwata
ability: Deny your Ultimate  Once per game, if the demon dies by execution you are executed instead.

name: Toko Fukawa
firstNightReminder: Point to the known player & show their character token. :reminder:
ability: M-m-m-master! You start knowing 1 player: you are mad that they are a good townsfolk. You may only vote when that player nominates or votes.

name: Byakuya Togami
firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of all in-play Minions.
ability: Perhaps this will be interesting after all  You start knowing which minions are in play. If good wins without you disclosing this information victory is yours alone.

name: Sakura Ogami
ability: In the end... If no good player votes when you nominate, all townsfolk are stupid until dusk tomorrow.

name: Kiyotaka Ishimaru
otherNightReminder: Night 2: Taka points to a player. Show the character token of that player. :reminder:
ability: Find your bro On night 2, choose a player (not yourself): learn their role and become their alignment.

name: Robo Justice
otherNightReminder: choose a player to kill and a player to learn a character :reminder:
ability: Who is the suspicious figure? Once per day, you may tell the storyteller a townsfolk. If that townsfolk is not in play, become that townsfolk: you are no longer Robo Justice.

name: Makoto Naegi
ability: Plot armour You cannot die by execution.

name: Aoi Asahina
firstNightReminder: Hina points to a player. Put Hina to sleep. Wake the chosen player. Show the Aoi Asahina character token and point to Hina. :reminder:
otherNightReminder: Hina points to a player. Put Hina to sleep. Wake the chosen player. Show the Aoi Asahina character token and point to Hina. :reminder:
ability: Share the doughnuts Each night, choose a player: they learn your identity and become stupid until dusk tomorrow.

name: Kyoko Kirigiri
ability: Ultimate detective  Once per game, during the day, you may explain you theory to the storyteller. They will tell you if you are hot or cold.

name: Chihiro Fujisaki
ability: Become strong If you die at night; become Alter Ego. Gain the ability to, once per game, gain the details of a conversation you were not part of from the Storyteller.

name: Hifumi Yamada
otherNightReminder: Hifumi points to a player and gives a thumbs up or thumbs down, nod or shake your head. :reminder:
ability: Embrace 2D  Once per game, at night, you may choose a player (not yourself): guess their alignment. The storyteller will tell you whether you are right or wrong.

name: Yasuhiro Hagakure
ability: Still the best fortune teller in the world  Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 1 thing in private: the storyteller roles a d6, on a 1, 2, 3 or 4 you are stupid until morning.

name: Mondo Owada
firstNightReminder: Point to the known player & show their character token. :reminder:
ability: Believe in better butter  You start knowing the name and role of a good player, once per game if they are killed you are killed instead.
